title: Ringtone and notifications play through both Bluetooth & phone speaker when Bluetooth is connected.
content: The media volume can go to either phone speaker or Bluetooth device......The ringer volume goes through both whether you like it or not. This is either a bug or just pure laziness when it comes to implementation. Please add this option in the next update. I would like the ringer to go to my Bluetooth only.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
